This post is only for testing htmlwidgets in this blogdown pipeline.


```{r}
library(htmlwidgets)
library(DT)
data(iris)
iris %>% DT::datatable()
```


```{r}
library(highcharter)
highcharts_demo() %>% 
  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_chalk())
```

```{r}
library(wordcloud2)

wordcloud2(data = demoFreq)
```


```{r}
library(widgetframe)
widgetframe::frameWidget(
wordcloud2(data = demoFreq)
)
```
